DataElement.preferredName: Patient Period Three Half Life Post Last Dose Monoclonal Antibody Eligibility Determination Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response indicating the patient meets the eligibility requirements for participation in a clinical trial with regards to at least three half-lives elapsing since the last dose of a monoclonal antibody.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Period Three Half Life Post Last Dose Monoclonal Antibody Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:An interval of time._A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one._The amount of time needed for a material to lose half of its physical, chemical, or biological activity._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._An antibody produced by a clone or genetically homogenous fast-growing cells i.e., hybridoma. Hybridoma cells are cloned to establish cell lines producing a specific antibody that is chemically and immunologically homogeneous. They are widely used in cancer detection, diagnosis, and treatment._The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Period Three Half Life Post Last Dose Monoclonal Antibody Eligibility Determination
Property.preferredDefinition: An interval of time._A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one._The amount of time needed for a material to lose half of its physical, chemical, or biological activity._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._An antibody produced by a clone or genetically homogenous fast-growing cells i.e., hybridoma. Hybridoma cells are cloned to establish cell lines producing a specific antibody that is chemically and immunologically homogeneous. They are widely used in cancer detection, diagnosis, and treatment._The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.
The amount of time needed for a material to lose half of its physical, chemical, or biological activity.
Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

An antibody produced by a clone or genetically homogenous fast-growing cells i.e., hybridoma. Hybridoma cells are cloned to establish cell lines producing a specific antibody that is chemically and immunologically homogeneous. They are widely used in cancer detection, diagnosis, and treatment.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has at least three half-lives elapsed since the last dose of a monoclonal antibody?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has it been at least three half-lives since prior therapy that included a monoclonal antibody?
